channel.title: Contacts on Global freshwater biodiversity research
channel.description: Recent content in Contacts on Global freshwater biodiversity research

item.title: Contact
item.description: We constantly seek possible collaborations regarding interesting projects, novel methods, data, and publications in spatial freshwater biodiversity science and beyond. Please do not hesitate to contact us to discuss further details. Join the group? Interested in joining the group? We are looking for motivated candidates across the Master, PhD and Postdoc levels. If you are interested please drop us a line indicating your reserach interests & plans and we can disuss how to move things further and possibly seek for funding opportunities.
